Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 63rd overall pick, by Houston in 1965...
Had first career hit on 6/13/1967, off Bob Friend (PIT)...
Earned first career win on 7/19/1967...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/1/1973 to a 5-year deal worth $5,750,000 per year...
Won World Series with San Francisco in 1973...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/2/1978 to a 2-year deal worth $5,547,000 per year...
